quote: Rise up, start fresh, see the bright opportunity in each new day.
author: Unknown

quote: Good morning! Have a positive mindset as you begin this day. It will make a difference.
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning is a new beginning, a fresh start to embrace the opportunities that come your way.
author: Unknown

quote: Today is a new day. Don't let the troubles of yesterday weigh you down. Instead, focus on the possibilities of today.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: Good morning! Start your day with a smile and positive thoughts. It sets the tone for a productive day ahead.
author: Unknown

quote: The morning shines upon everyone the same. Its beauty is for rich or poor alike. You are not less than anyone else in the eyes of the morning.
author: Unknown

quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: Every morning you have two choices: continue to sleep with your dreams or wake up and chase them.
author: Carmelo Anthony

quote: Good morning! Life is full of endless possibilities. Embrace them, cherish them, and make the most of them.
author: Unknown

quote: May your coffee be strong and your Monday be short. Good morning!
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning is a chance at a new day. Seize it, live it, and make the most out of it.
author: Unknown

quote: Good morning! Today is a gift, a new opportunity to make the most of your time and pursue your dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: The morning breeze on your face makes you realize that every morning is a new beginning.
author: Unknown

quote: Good morning! Don't let the challenges of yesterday discourage you. Today is a fresh start, a chance to do better.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love is not about how many days, weeks, or months you've been together, it's all about how much you love each other every day.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both can win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
author: Angelita Lim

quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
author: Unknown

quote: A positive attitude will lead to positive outcomes.
author: Unknown

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I don't have an attitude problem, you have a perception problem.
author: Unknown

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Your attitude is like a price tag, it shows how valuable you are.
author: Unknown

quote: Attitude is everything, so pick a good one.
author: Unknown

quote: A bad attitude is like a flat tire, you can't go anywhere until you change it.
author: Unknown

quote: Your attitude is either the lock on, or the key to the door of success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I don't have an attitude problem, you have a perception problem.
author: Unknown

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The secret to happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Happiness is not a goal; it's a by-product of a life well-lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The saddest thing about betrayal is that it never comes from your enemies.
author: Unknown

quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The worst kind of sad is not being able to explain why.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing sadder than a liar is a liar that's also a hypocrite!
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: It's sad when you realize you aren't as important to someone as you thought you were.
author: Unknown

quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can ever see and feel.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: It's sad when someone you care about becomes a stranger.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest pain that comes from love is loving someone you can never have.
author: Unknown

quote: When you're happy, you enjoy the music. When you're sad, you understand the lyrics.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: The saddest thing is to be a minute to someone when you've made them your eternity.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes it's better to be alone. Nobody can hurt you.
author: Unknown

quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: One day, you'll wake up and realize how much you truly lost. And when that day comes, I'll be waking up next to the girl who already knew.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
author: Chantal Sutherland

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe in yourself, take action, and you will succeed.
author: Unknown

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
author: Aisha Tyler

quote: Success is not the key to success. You have to fail and learn from your failures.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Herman Cain

quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Herman Cain

quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, during both the good times and the bad times.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings and the one that we take the least thought about acquiring.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Friendship is born when two people discover they aren't alone in the world.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, during both the good times and the bad times.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings and the one that we take the least thought about acquiring.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: Anniversaries are like birthdays: occasions to celebrate and to think ahead, usually among friends with whom one shares not only the past but also the future.
author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
author: Simone Signoret

quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
author: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
author: Nat King Cole

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds - they mature slowly.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: A successful marriage isn't the union of two perfect people. It's that of two imperfect people who have learned the value of forgiveness and grace.
author: Darlene Schacht

quote: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known - and even that is an understatement.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
author: John Lennon

quote: Birthdays are a new start, a fresh beginning, and a time to pursue new endeavors with new goals. Move forward with confidence and courage. You are a very special person. May today and all of your days be amazing!
author: Unknown

quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: A birthday is like a new year and my wish for you is a great year full of happiness and sunshine!
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
author: George Meredith

quote: Wishing you a day filled with love, good times, loads of presents, and a calorie-bomb birthday cake. Happy birthday!
author: Unknown

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: It's your birthday, and you can cry if you want to. But hey, why not laugh, dance, and enjoy yourself? You deserve it!
author: Unknown

quote: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Today is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be. Make the most of it!
author: Nicky Gumbel

quote: Don't count the years, make the years count.
author: George Meredith

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
author: Max Frisch

quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
author: John Dryden

quote: Jealousy is the art of counting someone else's blessings instead of your own.
author: Unknown

quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
author: Aristotle

quote: Jealousy is a wasted emotion.
author: Unknown

quote: Jealousy is the dragon in paradise; the hell of heaven; and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
author: A.R. Orage

quote: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.
author: George Eliot

quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point - that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative - self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck. Take your eyes off others and turn the scanner within. Find the seeds of your jealousy, clear the old voices and experiences. Put all the energy into building your personal and emotional security. Then you will be the one others envy, and you can remember the pain and reach out to them.
author: Jennifer James

quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
author: Max Frisch

quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
author: John Dryden

quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Meditation is the ultimate mobile device; you can use it anywhere, anytime, unobtrusively.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
author: Buddha

quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Silence is not an absence but a presence.
author: Anne D. LeClaire

quote: Don't just do something, sit there!
author: Unknown

quote: You should sit in meditation for twenty minutes every day, unless you're too busy. Then you should sit for an hour.
author: Zen proverb

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It's a way of entering into the quiet that's already there.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: In the stillness of the mind, I saw myself as I am: unbound.
author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quote: Your goal is not to battle with the mind but to witness the mind.
author: Swami Muktananda

quote: The more regularly and the more deeply you meditate, the sooner you will find yourself acting always from a center of peace.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Meditation is not spacing-out or running away. In fact, it is being totally honest with ourselves.
author: Kathleen McDonald

quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
author: Owen Feltham

quote: Meditation practice isn't about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we are already.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
author: John Muir

quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
author: John Muir

quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The poetry of the earth is never dead.
author: John Keats

quote: The mountains are calling, and I must go.
author: John Muir

quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The richness I achieve comes from Nature, the source of my inspiration.
author: Claude Monet

quote: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in a while, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
author: John Muir

quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon the verdant green hills is the most perfect refreshment.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Nature is not a place to visit. It is home.
author: Gary Snyder

quote: Nature never did betray the heart that loved her.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: And now we welcome the new year. Full of things that have never been.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The old year has gone. Let the dead past bury its own dead. The new year has taken possession of the clock of time. All hail the duties and possibilities of the coming twelve months!
author: Edward Payson Powell

quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
author: Walter Scott

quote: What the new year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the new year.
author: Vern McLellan

quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Ring out the old, ring in the new.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quote: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.

quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: The old year has gone. Let the dead past bury its own dead. The new year has taken possession of the clock of time. All hail the duties and possibilities of the coming twelve months!

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Thank you for being the reason I smile.
author: Unknown

quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners, it is good spirituality.
author: Alfred Painter

quote: We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Thank you for always being there for me, even when I'm not easy to be around.
author: Unknown

quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Thank you for brightening my world.
author: Unknown

quote: A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.
author: Unknown

quote: Thank you for making me feel special.
author: Unknown

quote: Thank you for your love and support.
author: Unknown

quote: Thank you for being you.
author: Unknown

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Thank you for being a ray of sunshine in my life.
author: Unknown

quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Thank you for your kindness and generosity.
author: Unknown

quote: A simple 'thank you' can brighten someone's day.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is not finding someone to live with, it's finding someone you can't live without.
author: Unknown

quote: In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
author: Roy Croft

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: Andre Breton

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Good night. Sleep tight. Wake up bright.
author: Unknown

quote: Night is a wonderful opportunity to take rest, to forgive, to dream, to smile, and to get ready for all the battles that you have to fight tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Sleeping is nice. You forget about everything for a little while.
author: Unknown

quote: Goodnight. Let the stars light the way to where your dreams can be found awaiting your arrival.
author: Unknown

quote: The night is not forever, but our love is. Good night, my sweetheart.
author: Unknown

quote: The best bridge between despair and hope is a good night's sleep.
author: Unknown

quote: Day is over, night has come. Today is gone, what's done is done. Embrace your dreams, through the night. Tomorrow comes with a whole new light.
author: Unknown

quote: Good night. May you fall asleep in the arms of a dream, so beautiful, you'll cry when you awake.
author: Unknown

quote: The stars and moon arrive just to wish you a good night. Let the light of the moon guide your dreams as you pass the night away.
author: Unknown

quote: May you dream of lovely things and to find them real.
author: Unknown

quote: As the night gets dark, let your worries fade. Sleep peacefully knowing you've done all you can do for today.
author: Unknown

quote: Good night. May you fall asleep in the comforting arms of sweet dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: The night is longer than a day for those who dream and day is longer than night for those who make their dreams come true.
author: Unknown

quote: You are the reason why I have sleepless nights. You are the reason why I tend to hold my pillow tight. And you are the reason I can't sleep without saying goodnight.
author: Unknown

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Unknown

quote: Good night. Look up, we are both under the same starry sky.
author: Unknown

quote: The power of social media is that it allows you to engage and interact with a global audience.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: Social media is not just a spoke on the wheel of marketing. It's becoming the way entire bicycles are built.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Social media is about sociology and psychology more than technology.
author: Brian Solis

quote: The goal of social media is to turn customers into your personal evangelist.
author: Shane Barker

quote: Social media is not a media. The key is to listen, engage, and build relationships.
author: David Alston

quote: Social media is the ultimate equalizer. It gives a voice and a platform to anyone willing to engage.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: Social media is not just an activity; it is an investment of valuable time and resources.
author: Sean Gardner

quote: Social media is the new way of communication, and it is everywhere; it changes the world and individual's lives.
author: Anonymous

quote: Social media is not a one-time thing. It's a daily, ongoing commitment.
author: Kathleen A. Kearns

quote: Social media is not a sales pitch. It's a conversation.
author: Unknown

quote: Social media is not just a spoke on the wheel of marketing. It's becoming the way entire bicycles are built.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Social media is here. It's not going away; not a passing fad. Be where your customers are: in social media.
author: Lori Ruff

quote: Social media is about sociology and psychology more than technology.
author: Brian Solis

quote: Social media is about the people! Not about your business. Provide for the people and the people will provide for you.
author: Matt Goulart

quote: Social media is changing the way we communicate and the way we are perceived, both positively and negatively.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: Social media is about the people! Not about your business. Provide for the people and the people will provide for you.
author: Matt Goulart

quote: Social media is just a buzzword until you come up with a plan.
author: Unknown

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: I think, therefore I am.
author: René Descartes

quote: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Man is condemned to be free.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: What is rational is actual and what is actual is rational.
author: G. W. F. Hegel

quote: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance.
author: Socrates

quote: To be is to be perceived.
author: George Berkeley

quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
author: Buddha

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
author: Epicurus

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is the highest good.
author: Aristotle

quote: Man is the measure of all things.
author: Protagoras

quote: We live in the best of all possible worlds.
author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quote: The will to power is the will to live.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
author: Unknown

quote: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not clumsy, the floor just hates me.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing.
author: Unknown

quote: I put the 'pro' in procrastination.
author: Unknown

quote: I don't sweat, I sparkle.
author: Unknown

quote: I speak fluent sarcasm.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not old, I'm vintage.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not weird, I'm limited edition.
author: Unknown

quote: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
